TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SlotsDroppingTransformer extends Microsoft.ML.Data.OneToOneTransformerBase
Public NotInheritable Class SlotsDroppingTransformer Inherits OneToOneTransformerBase

Docs.summary: Transform to drop slots from columns. If the column is scalar, the only slot that can be dropped is slot 0. If all the slots are to be dropped, a vector valued column will be changed to a vector of length 1 (a scalar column will retain its type) and the value will be the default value.
